column33: sign: Injured? Pick up the healing potion to the left, and drink it by using it in the inventory.
column41: sign: Unsure of what something is? Use ; to start the examine cursor.
column48: sign: The door to your left can be opened by walking into it.
column50: sign: Try attacking the dummy to your right! You can attack enemies by walking into them with a weapon equipped.
sign: You can equip your dagger by selecting the letter next to it while in your inventory.

column31: sign: Want to get through the window to your right? Pickup a blink scroll, and read one to use it.

column41: sign: Welcome to Dungeon Star! As I see you have already discovered how to move around, simply walk to the right to progress.
column45: sign: Press ? at any time for help.
column50: sign: To pick up an item, walk over it and press g, and then open your inventory with i.
